P51N.description: Perception of social media's impact on politics
P51N.question: Would you say that social media makes politics better, worse, or has no effect?

P52N.description: Perception of social media as representing public opinion
P52N.question: Do you think that what is said on social media reflects what the general public thinks?

P53N.A.description: Perceived level of false information in social media
P53N.A.question: How much false information do you think circulates on social media?

P53N.B.description: Perceived level of false information on TV
P53N.B.question: How much false information do you think circulates on TV?

P53N.C.description: Perceived level of false information on radio
P53N.C.question: How much false information do you think circulates on radio?

P53N.D.description: Perceived level of false information in printed press
P53N.D.question: How much false information do you think circulates in the printed press?

P55N.question: Thinking about your purchases and payments, how many are digital (credit card, debit card, QR codes, etc.)?

P56N.A.description: Perception of electronic payments as more reliable than cash
P56N.A.question: Do you agree or disagree that paying electronically is more reliable than using cash?

P56N.B.description: Perception of data security in electronic payments
P56N.B.question: Do you agree or disagree that your personal data is secure when you pay electronically?

P56N.C.description: Preference for electronic payments over cash
P56N.C.question: Do you agree or disagree that if you can choose, you prefer to pay electronically instead of using cash?

P56N.D.description: Perception of safety when carrying no cash
P56N.D.question: Do you agree or disagree that it is safer to walk in the street without cash and pay electronically?
